Description: The slope (%) of the stream segment
Upstream functional network route measure in km. This measurement is affected by the presence of barriers.
Downstream functional  network route measure in km. This measurement is affected by the presence of barriers.
Upstream total network route measure in km.
Downstream total network route measure in km.
Number of barriers upstream of segment.
Number of barriers downstream of segment.
IDs of barriers upstream of segment.
IDs of barriers downstream of segment.

Nature of the occurrence through time (e.g., permanent, intermittent). This is directly equivalent to the Permanency attribute in the NHN (-1-Unknown, 0-None, 1-Permanent, 2-Intermittent. Users should not rely on data in the field as it may not be current).
Stream temperature category (categorical e.g., cold, warm, cool, etc.). Not currently assigned through any tools.
Additional attributes may be added as needed or as computed.
